data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 3
data.actual_result: It is always with manage server or admin permissions visible even though you are not the owner.
data.expected_result: The "Security" menu shouldn't be visible because you have no permission to change anything there.
data.short_description: Security menu within server settings without permissions visible
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have Manage Server permission but you are not the owner - Open server settings - Go to the "Security" menu
